B randIndex, which measures public perception of brands, has issued rankings of the best-perceived brands in the U.S. for midyear 2015. No. 1 is Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN ), followed by two other online names, Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX ) and YouTube. No. 4 is Cancer Treatment Centers of America; No. 5 is sandwich maker Subway. 
The most improved brand is General Motors (NYSE: GM ) ("CEO Mary Barra has made it her goal to ... make sure errors of the past are not forgotten and not repeated"), followed by Target (NYSE: TGT ), travel website Trivago and GM brands Chevrolet and Buick.
